item.description:
[b]Update[/b]
Jared will be organzing this meetup. Thanks Jared for stepping in! The movie time is 7:20.
If the movie is upstairs, he will be waiting by the tables next to the giant window. If the movie is downstairs, he will be waiting behind the rope across from the refreshment stand.
If you miss the group before the movie, no worries, you can meet us after. We gather outside the doors of the room showing the movie afterwards. Then we head out for some munchies and a beer. Or two.
I encourage you to buy tickets ahead of time at fandango.com.
[b]Synopsis[/b]
In a dynamic new portrayal of Arthur Conan Doyle's most famous characters, "Sherlock Holmes" sends Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson on their latest challenge. Revealing fighting skills as lethal as his legendary intellect, Holmes will battle as never before to bring down a new nemesis and unravel a deadly plot that could destroy the country.
[b]Trailer[/b]

item.name: Sherlock Holmes
